attributes.action: Higher minimum penalties for death by dangerous driving
attributes.background: I want people who have committed death by dangerous driving due to drugs to permanently have their licence removed and never have chance to reapply, and longer sentences for death by dangerous driving with a minimum of 20 years without parole.
